name: specstory-vscode
description: Save, export, search and share AI chat history from GitHub Copilot and Cursor

specstory.cloudSync.enabled.description:
Default cloud sync behavior for new projects. 'always' enables sync automatically, 'ask' prompts the user for each new project, 'never' disables sync by default.

NOTE: This requires you to be logged in to SpecStory.
specstory.cloudSync.enabled.markdownDescription:
Default cloud sync behavior for new projects. 'always' enables sync automatically, 'ask' prompts the user for each new project, 'never' disables sync by default.

NOTE: This requires you to be logged in to SpecStory.

specstory.autoSave.enabled.description: Automatically save AI chat history into the ./.specstory directory

specstory.derivedRules.enabled.description:
EXPERIMENTAL: Automatically derive project specific AI rules to guide the editor, based on your auto-saved chat and composer history. (.cursor/rules/derived-rules.mdc in Cursor or .github/copilot-instructions.md in VSCode).

NOTE: Requires autosave to be enabled and that you be logged in to SpecStory.
specstory.derivedRules.enabled.markdownDescription:

NOTE: Requires autosave to be enabled and that you be logged in to SpecStory.

specstory.derivedRules.headers.description:
The markdown headers to use for sections of the derived rules file.

This will influence the structure of the file and the sections that are created:

specstory.coordinatedUniversalTimezone.description: Use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) timezone. If unchecked, the local timezone will be used instead.
specstory.coordinatedUniversalTimezone.markdownDescription: Use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) timezone. If unchecked, the local timezone will be used instead.

specstory.helpUsImprove.description: To make SpecStory better this option lets us collect usage data from the extension. This includes questions in chat, code snippets, edits, and editor actions. This setting does not affect web analytics. See our [privacy policy](https://specstory.com/privacy) for details.
